pkgmetadata.longdescription: The chromeos-cr50 package retrieves the offical cr50 firmware as a blob from the binary component server (BCS). Note that the board overlay must define the "cr50_onboard" USE flag for the FW to be included in the build for the device.

use.flag: In order for the cr50 firmware to be included in a board image, its configuration must specify this flag. The flag is required for installing the package itself as a safeguared against accidental inclusion on a system.
